The blaze lights the trail of gasoline left by the broken fuel tank and a stream of liquid fire races up the hill, ending at Nick's feet. Nick takes a moment to watch in horror as dark plumes of smoke billow into the sky, the geyser of water, the storm of dazed chickens. dialogue.raw_text: Oh, darling, I'm sure he would have found it most... Appealing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I like lying here with you, Carlotta.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You do?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can't think of anyone I'd rather lie here with.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Except maybe Nick. If Nick were here, what do you suppose he would do to me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Make love to you I would think.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Then why don't you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Pardon?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Take off that silly wig and make love to me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sheeni! You knew!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Of course, Nick. Did you really expect to fool your soul mate with such a disguise?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Take me darling!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Into the NICK'S PENIS nightclub where champagne bottles POP with the ringing in of a new era, and the Leopards ROAR, and the stage erupts with fireworks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nick sleeps with a grin on his face. He rouses at the touch of Sheeni's lips on his cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sheeni hauls herself out of bed and grabs the phone off the cradle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She smiles at him and he smiles back.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: My parents are at services. They won't be back for hours.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Shall we have breakfast, my love?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What a lovely notion, darling. You go ahead downstairs and get things started.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What are you doing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Calling Taggarty to report that you are not completely incompetent in the bedroom.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do I get to stay and hear my grade?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not a chance, Mr. Twisp. Such things are reserved for girl talk only. And for good reason.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Very well, Sheeni. Don't be long.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . SAUNDERS' MOBILE HOME - DAY Nick prances into the living room in his underwear. He starts to head into the kitchen when he catches sight of the full length mirror out of the corner of his eye. He stops in front of the mirror and flexes his biceps. Admires himself. Francois appears in the mirror behind Nick, Thompson slung over his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nick lowers his arms and furrows his brow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nick lifts his eyebrows with dawning epiphany. In the reflection we can see behind Nick as Albert leaps onto the love seat and barks at the sound of approaching sirens. Nick runs to the window just in time to see half a dozen law enforcement vehicles pull up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He ducks down from the window as a chopper buzzes overhead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nick spins to face her. She's standing in the doorway and there's not a hint of wrong-doing in her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nick looks to Francois in disbelief. But the Frenchman just rolls his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A long pensive beat as Nick contemplates telling her he may never see her again. But behind Sheeni's air of control, Nick finally sees the vulnerability he's had in his hands all along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sheeni beams. Francois smacks his forehead with hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Frenchman in the mirror sticks the barrel of the Thompson in his mouth and blows himself OUT OF FRAME just as... ...the front door bursts open and the FBI AGENTS surround Nick.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Well, good morning, Francois. What do you think?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do I sink? I sink now's are chance to run for ze hills.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do you mean?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nick, we are young, yes? Is the world not our oyster? Beaucoup des filles. Do you not want to know what it is like to make love to another girl?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I do, but... We've come so far. What about Sheeni?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Forget Sheeni. Yes, she will always be ze first conquest, but all zis time you saught zis was ze end, ze one and only, when in fact it is only ze beginning.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sheeni, the police are here!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Quick! Maybe I can sneak out the back!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ! WE HAVE YOU SURROUNDED!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't understand. How do they even know I'm alive?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Well, I called them of course.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, thanks a pantsful!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But, Nickie, it had to be done.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But... but why?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can't very well marry a wanted man, honey. Look at it this way, in a few months you'll be a free man and we can be together in Paris.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You might as well break it to her now, Nick.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Francois is right of course, but on the other hand, why be cruel? After all, Sheeni had managed to give me hope every step of the way. And if hope is what Sheeni would now need to go on, well then...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: As always, you are right, my love.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Merd.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . SAUNDERS' MOBILE HOME - DAY The agents lead Nick to the caravan of law enforcement parked in the road.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sheeni emerges from the home, Albert barking in protest. Nick strains against his cuffs to look over his shoulder at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The FBI agents shove Nick into the back of their black Saturn.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Arrested? Ha. It may not appear so, but the truth is... I've got the world on a string.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Write often, Nickie.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I will, darling.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And don't worry about Albert. He'll be waiting for you too.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) As Francois would remind me, I'm intelligent, healthy, virile, not violently ugly... On the whole I am splendidly equipped for this great adventure we call the human existence.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Nick watches out the back window as the car pulls away. A view of Sheeni waving in the road, Albert at her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nick turns to face the front while behind him the waving figure gets ever more distant. A pensive moment as he actually questions...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nick revisits those thirty two minutes in his mind and it brings a smirk to his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And as Tom Jones' SHE'S A LADY kicks in, we...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Besides, what jury would convict a teenager who acted out of love? And even if I do get to spend the next few months of my youth getting Dwayned by the inmates of the California Juvenile Correctional System, I did get my thirty two minutes of lovemaking with one of the most outstanding girls of this or any other epoch.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) But was it all worth it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) You bet your left nut it was.
dialogue.name: dialogue
